title: Inside a school for suicide bombers
description: Filmmaker Sharmeen Obaid-Chinoy takes on a terrifying question: How does the Taliban convince children to become suicide bombers? Propaganda footage from a training camp is intercut with her interviews of young camp graduates. A shocking vision.
author: Sharmeen Obaid-Chinoy
keywords: TED, talks, TED Fellows, children, culture, film, politics, suicide, war
